GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19 to before v5.19.4
GSD.description:
drm/i915/ttm: don't leak the ccs state

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit b431cffb4883b9e90d48f0c408674c50fef428a5, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit 48760ffe923aeb2cc73865ea36b3509718d102e3. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/i915/ttm: don't leak the ccs state
